sentences.sContent: Opponents of the treaty argue that monetary union will turn France into a vassal of Germany.
sentences.sCn: 协定的反对者认为货币联盟会使法国沦为德国的附庸国。

trans.tranCn: 诸侯, 封臣, 附庸, 诸侯
trans.tranOther: In feudal society, a vassal was a man who gave military service to a lord, in return for which he was protected by the lord and received land to live on
